responsibilities: Currently designing and developing the official mobile app and website of the company.
Designed and developed a fully-featured clone of Microsoft Teams using Agile methods, under the guidance of Mr. Shanav Asija, Senior SWE at Microsoft.
Designed and developed the official website of the CSE department using GatsbyJS. Built a headless CMS using NetlifyCMS and improved the management of website content and articles.
Redesigned the website as well as restructured it. Utilised the Velo API by Wix to code customized elements- like the custom product carousel on the homepage.

Contributed towards providing free and quality education to 460 children in 28 villages across India. Conducted live online classes in English and Mathematics for elementary and middle school students adversely affected by COVID-19.
